newsitem.title: DUBAI: Dubai Investment Co announces maiden results.
newsitem.headline: Dubai Investment Co announces maiden results.

text.p: Dubai Investment Co announced net profit of 58.4 million dirhams ($15.9 million) for 1996, its first year of operations, the Gulf News newspaper reported on Wednesday.
It said no dividend was declared, and the profit would be transferred to reserves.
Total assets in the year rose to 718 million dirhams from 650 million, the newspaper said.
It quoted DIC Chairman Anis al-Jallaf as saying the company was in talks with firms in Abu Dhabi to set up joint ventures in the petrochemicals sector.
"We and Abu Dhabi companies have expressed a strong desire to set up joint projects and we have highlighted petrochemicals," Jallaf was quoted as saying. He gave no details.
